import{Button,Checkbox,IconButton,List,ListItem,ListItemText,TextField}from'@material-ui/core';import DeleteIcon from'@material-ui/icons/Delete';import axios from'axios';import{jsPDF}from'jspdf';import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import"./App.css";import logo from'./shanture-logo.png';// Ensure you have the logo file
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[newTask,setNewTask]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetchTasks();},[]);const fetchTasks=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:3001/tasks');setTasks(response.data.data);};const addTask=async()=>{if(newTask.trim()){await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/tasks',{task:newTask});fetchTasks();setNewTask('');}};const deleteTask=async id=>{await axios.delete("http://localhost:3001/tasks/".concat(id));fetchTasks();};const toggleTaskCompletion=async(id,completed)=>{try{await axios.put("http://localhost:3001/tasks/".concat(id),{completed:!completed});fetchTasks();}catch(error){console.error('Error updating task completion status:',error);}};const downloadPDF=()=>{const doc=new jsPDF();doc.text("Task List",10,10);tasks.forEach((task,index)=>{doc.text("".concat(index+1,". ").concat(task.task," - ").concat(task.completed?'Completed':'Not Completed'),10,20+index*10);});doc.save('task-list.pdf');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"Shanture Logo",style:{width:'100px',marginBottom:'0px'},className:"company-logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"company-name",children:"Shanture"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"todo-list-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-items",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"To-Do list application"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center",alignItems:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"New Task",value:newTask,onChange:e=>setNewTask(e.target.value),style:{marginBottom:'20px',marginRight:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:addTask,children:"Add Task"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{children:tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{style:{textDecoration:task.completed?'line-through':'none'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkbox,{checked:task.completed,onChange:()=>toggleTaskCompletion(task.id,task.completed)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:task.task}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{edge:"end","aria-label":"delete",onClick:()=>deleteTask(task.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{})})]},task.id))})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",alignItems:"center"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"secondary",onClick:downloadPDF,style:{marginTop:'20px',textAlign:"center"},children:"Download PDF"})})]});};export default App;
